info.initial: In order to save your replics and your account information, you need to connect to a server. Enter below the URL of the endpoint you want to connect to.
info.change_noauth: Change the endpoint of the server you want to connect to.
info.change_auth: Change the endpoint of the server you want to connect to. Your data from this account will be saved, but not reachable until you change the endpoint back to the current one.

login.title: Login
login.description: Log into your existing account to save the replics you create.

signup_link.pre: Need to create an account first?

signup.title: Create account
signup.description: An account allows you to access your created replics in the web client. Furthermore, you have access to replics from other users with a higher access-level.

create_replic.title: Replicate page
create_replic.info: Replicate the website you have opened in this browser by clicking the button below. A link will be created that you can share for others to visit the same page.

error.page_invalid: The tab you have currently opened can not be replicated. Choose another tab to replicate.
error.quota_reached: You cannot create any more replics as you have reached your quota.
error.too_big: The page you want to replicate is too big.

replic_created.title: Replic created
replic_created.description: The replic was successfully created. You can use the following link to access the page and share with other users:

error.not_found: An error occurred showing the replic.

not_verified.title: Account not verified
not_verified.error: An error occurred while trying to verify your email-address. Try again later.

description.waiting: To create replics, verify your email-address by requesting an email below and clicking the link sent to your address.
description.sent: A message was sent to your email-address. Click the link to verify.
